mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COACHES(UID, PROFILE_PHOTO, CAREER, IS_APPROVED, STORY, TYPE1, TYPE2, TYPE3) VALUES(#{uid}, #{profilePhoto}, #{career}, FALSE, #{TYPE1}, #{TYPE2}, #{TYPE3})
mapper.select: SELECT COACHES.ID, COACHES.UID, COACHES.PROFILE_PHOTO, COACHES.CAREER, COACHES.IS_APPROVED, COACHES.STORY, COACHES.TYPE1, COACHES.TYPE2, COACHES.TYPE3 FROM USERS, COACHES WHERE USERS.ID = COACHES.UID AND USERS.NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchword}, '%')

SELECT * FROM COACHES WHERE TYPE1 in (#{goal}, #{like}, "등", "끈기있는", "중급자", "건강", "웨이트") OR TYPE2 in (#{goal}, #{like}, "등", "끈기있는", "중급자", "건강", "웨이트") OR TYPE3 in (#{goal}, #{like}, "등", "끈기있는", "중급자", "건강", "웨이트") LIMIT 14
